Nueva Loja

5 Day Cuyabeno Adventure

Start and end in Nueva Loja! With the Adventure tour 5 Day Amazon Cuyabeno Adventure, you have a 5 days tour package taking you through Nueva Loja, Ecuador and Cuyabeno Wildlife Preserve

  1. Arrival to Cuyabeno

    Today, your Amazon Cuyabeno Adventure starts. You can take a flight (9:15 am) or take a bus to the Cuyabeno which is the starting point of the tour.

  2. Arrival to Cuyabeno

    Today, your Amazon Cuyabeno Adventure starts. You can take a flight (9:15 am) or take a bus to the Cuyabeno which is the starting point of the tour.

  3. Arrival to Cuyabeno

    Today, your Amazon Cuyabeno Adventure starts. You can take a flight (9:15 am) or take a bus to the Cuyabeno which is the starting point of the tour.
